bonusPoints.name: Rocky Foundations - Make an opponent lose control of a mana rock
Beat Up The Dork - Make an opponent lose control of a mana dork
Speak To The Manager - Make an opponent lose control of a commander
Salted Earth - Make an opponent lose control of a non-basic land
Heart of the Cards - Finish the game without searching your deck
At Any Cost - Cast your comander 3 times in one game
Necromancer - Finish the game with more cards in your grave than your deck
Screwdriver - Tap the same permanent 3 times in one turn
Worthy Sacrifice - Sacrifie 5 non-land permanents in one turn
As Garfield Intended - Kill a player with non-commander combat damage
Sword and Board - Control a permanent with 2 auras/equipment attached
Gracious Gift - Cast a spell/ability that lets an opponent draw a card
Voltron - Deal 21 points of commander damage (across any number of players)
Inspector Gadget - Control 3 different artifact tokens
Face Is The Place - Cast an instant/sorcery that deals direct damage to a player
Traitor - Deal commander damage to a player with their own commander
Back In My Day - Cast a card from the first Magic set you ever played
Meeple Mage - Control two or more gameplay trackers (Monarch, Intitive, City's Blessing etc)
Counter This! - Cast a spell that can't be countered
Spark Strike - Attack with a planeswalker
